Title: Rest in Pain
Plot: The next morning, Cooper meets with Audrey, who confesses to leaving him the note about One Eyed Jack's.  Cooper tells Truman he can't remember who the killer was in his dream, but insists the dream is a code to solving the crime.  Albert, after offending everyone in town, is forced to end his autopsy early. Albert and Truman come to blows. Bobby, James and Leland all make a scene at Laura's funeral. GuestStars: Walter Olkewicz, Royce D. Applegate, Jed Mills, Robert Bauer, Brett Vadset, Clay Wilcox, Erika Anderson, Peter Michael Goetz
